abstract: In a revised lawsuit, Irving Picard claims the bank “was an active enabler of the Madoff Ponzi scheme.”
snippet: In a revised lawsuit, Irving Picard claims the bank “was an active enabler of the Madoff Ponzi scheme.”
lead_paragraph: Irving H. Picard, the trustee liquidating Bernard L. Madoff’s firm, said on Friday that he had filed a revised lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase & Company, demanding a minimum of $19 billion in damages.

headline.main: Madoff Trustee Seeking Billions More From JPMorgan
headline.print_headline: Madoff Trustee Seeking Billions More From JPMorgan
